sourceDesc.p: The transcription was done from digital facsimiles distributed by the International Dunhuang Project and the Bibliothèque nationale de France. For a detailed description of a ms from the Pelliot collection please refer to the "Catalogue des manuscrits chinois de Touen-Houang" Paris 1970-2001. For mss from the Stein collection try Lionel Giles "Descriptive Catalogue of the Chinese Manuscripts from Tunhuang in the British Museum." London: British Museum, 1957.
